# The most simplistic blogging setup you'll ever come across

No, no fancy framework, no complex build tools, just JS used correctly. Automated, free of cost, seo optimised! No it's not a prank.

Write your blog post content here using Markdown.

## Getting Started

You can use:
- **Bold text**
- *Italic text*
- `inline code`
- [Links](https://example.com)
- Lists
- Code blocks

